A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really wanted to like this movie\, but It felt really cheesy and shallow. Almost everything that was set up in Force Awakens was brushed aside and failed to deliver any payoff. Much of the run time was wasted on a illogical side story\, and characters weren't allowed time for proper development. It was a mess. That being said\, there were a few moments that were enjoyable\, but they had more to do with spectacle and the actors than story. I hope episode IX is able to improve on these faults and deliver a satisfying conclusion\, and that Rian Johnson's upcoming trilogy earns its place in the Star Wars canon.
